name: df-frmd
body: |- wceq(cfrmd, cmpt(s0, universe, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cword(cv(s0))), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cres(cconcat, cxp(cword(cv(s0)), cword(cv(s0))))))))
comment: Define a free monoid over a set ` i ` of generators, defined as the set of finite strings on ` I ` with the operation of concatenation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Sep-2015.)
